documentServiceEndpoint.description: The service endpoint for updating documents in a search domain.

indexFields.description: The index fields for documents added to the domain. Documented below.

multiAz.description: Whether or not to maintain extra instances for the domain in a second Availability Zone to ensure high availability.

name.description: The name of the CloudSearch domain.
